Kansas_City.Blue Hills, Kansas City:
Blue Hills is a neighborhood in Southeast Kansas City, Missouri bounded North by Swope Parkway, South by 63rd Street, East by Prospect Ave, and West by The Paseo.
Blue Hills was a working class white neighborhood until the 1960s when blockbusting caused massive white flight. This KCSD public schools that served Blue Hills were Troost Elementary School, J. J. Pershing Elementary, Southeast and Paseo High Schools.
